title: DEXA 2019 Submission
content: I have been working with a team of professors and a fellow student to prepare a research paper for submission at DEXA, a database conference being held in Linz, Austria

title: Internship Accepted
content: I have just accepted a summer position with Leidos as a Software Engineer Intern. I will be working on their air traffic control software out of their Eagan office.

title: Song of the Day
content: A song that I produced for my band, 'Fauna & Flora', was chosen to be the Song of the Day on 89.3 The Current.
